text: Norma May is a former female English international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== May was the English champion after winning the English National Championship in 1987 when she defeated Mary Price in the final of the singles. She represented England in the fours event, at the 1990 Commonwealth Games in Auckland, New Zealand. ==References== Category:Living people Category:English female bowls players Category:Bowls players at the 1990 Commonwealth Games Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Norma May
